alert.note: Alert for Morris; Sussex; Warren (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 3:08PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...ELEVATED RISK OF WILDFIRE SPREAD THIS AFTERNOON AND WEDNESDAY... Afternoon minimum relative humidity values are forecast to range from 18 to 30 percent this afternoon and again on Wednesday. Winds speeds are forecast to be 10 to 15 MPH with gusts of 20 to 25 MPH. Winds will be from the southwest this afternoon, and from the northwest on Wednesday. This, combined with recent dry conditions, will result in an elevated risk for the spread of wildfires this afternoon and Wednesday. Use extra caution if handling any potential ignition source, such as machinery, or cigarettes and matches. Be sure to properly discard all smoking materials. Any dry grasses, dead leaves, or other tree litter that ignite will have the potential to spread fire quickly. For more information about wildfire danger, burn restrictions, and wildfire prevention and eduction, please visit your state`s forestry or environmental protection website.
